dcterms:creator: Najoung Kim
Tal Linzen
dcterms:description: COGS is a synthetic semantic parsing dataset in which English sentences must be mapped to logic-based meaning representations. It distinguishes 21 generalization types, each requiring generalizing from training instances to test instances in a particular systematic and linguistically-informed way.
dcterms:title: COGS

dcterms:creator: Brenden Lake
Marco Baroni
dcterms:description: SCAN is a dataset designed to evaluate the compositional skills of sequence-to-sequence models, focusing on generalization without systematicity.
dcterms:title: SCAN

dcterms:description: CFQ is a dataset that measures compositional generalization through a comprehensive method on realistic data.

dcterms:description: Geoquery is a dataset used for learning algebraic recombination for compositional generalization.

dcterms:description: AMRBank is a dataset that facilitates symmetric AMR semantic parsing and generation without a complex pipeline.
dcterms:title: AMRBank
